text: Joseph 'Jup' Weber (15 June 1950 - 8 October 2021) was a Luxembourgian politician. He founded the Greens in 1983. He was a Member of the European Parliament between 1994 until 1999. Weber was born in Luxembourg City. Weber died on 8 October 2021 in Luxembourg City at the age of 71.Former Green party MP Jup Weber passes away ==References== ==Other websites== *European Parliament profile Category:MEPs for Luxembourg Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Jup Weber
